# MCP Context

> In this `llms.txt`, I'm collecting all useful most up-to-date context for building high-quality MCPs.

## Core

- [MCP schema 2025-11-25](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/modelcontextprotocol/modelcontextprotocol/refs/heads/main/schema/2025-11-25/schema.ts): The latest schema in TypeScript, useful anytime you need footprints of how things ought to be implemented.
- [Tasks](https://modelcontextprotocol.io/specification/2025-11-25/basic/utilities/tasks.md): Experimental new feature of MCP
- [Key Changes](https://modelcontextprotocol.io/specification/2025-11-25/changelog.md)
- [All other latest docs](https://modelcontextprotocol.io/llms.txt)

## Authorization

- [MCP Authorization](https://modelcontextprotocol.io/specification/2025-11-25/basic/authorization.md)
- [MCP Security](https://modelcontextprotocol.io/specification/2025-11-25/basic/security_best_practices.md)
- [/.well-known/oauth-authorization-server](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc8414.txt)
- [/.well-known/oauth-protected-resource](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc9728.txt)
- [/register](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc7591.txt)
